Men of the world study to be courteous, to make themselves as pleasing as possible. They study to render their address and manners such that they will have the greatest influence over those with whom they associate. They use their 


                                     -110- 

knowledge and abilities as skillfully as possible in order to gain this object. "The children of this world are in their generation wiser than the children of light" [Luke 16:8].
